definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: 'And it's a better hiding-place than out here in the country.
sentences.chinese: 那儿是个比乡间更好的藏身的地方。

sentences.english: The countryside abounds in wild life of every kind.
sentences.chinese: 乡间繁生各种野生生物。

sentences.english: He read many books, he went to the theatre, and in the summer he stayed in the country for six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他读了许多书，去看过戏，在乡间避暑待了六个星期。

sentences.english: Our car bowled along the smooth country roads.
sentences.chinese: 我们的汽车在平坦的乡间道路上很快地行驶。

sentences.english: A man's car stalled on a country road one morning.
sentences.chinese: 一天早上，一个男人开的车在乡间的路上抛锚了。

sentences.english: I am rather fond of a solitary stroll in the country.
sentences.chinese: 我颇喜欢在乡间独自徜徉。

sentences.english: The Robinsons decided to lease a house in the country for a year.
sentences.chinese: 罗宾森家决定在乡间租一年的房子。

sentences.english: I want to build myself a country house.
sentences.chinese: 我想给自己建一座乡间别墅。

sentences.english: He added the talks at his country retreat covered a variety of subjects.
sentences.chinese: 卡梅伦说，在他乡间别墅的会谈涉及了一系列的问题。

sentences.english: The jeep bucketed over the bumpy road.
sentences.chinese: 轿车在乡间路上颠簸前进。

sentences.english: He treated his friends in his country cottage.
sentences.chinese: 他在他的乡间别墅款待了他的朋友们。

sentences.english: Even as short a break as a day's hike in the country will allow you to remove yourself from familiar people and places.
sentences.chinese: 即便是乡间一日游也能让你远离你熟悉的人和地方。

sentences.english: Japanese people envy the dachas which Russians have.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯人的乡间别墅让日本人很是羡慕嫉妒。

sentences.english: A pair of Oxen was drawing a heavily loaded wagon along a miry country road.
sentences.chinese: 有两只公牛拉着一辆满载的货车走在乡间泥泞的路上。

sentences.english: Living in the country is less expensive than in the city.
sentences.chinese: 住在乡间比住在城里花钱少。

sentences.english: The country lane twists and turns between small cottages.
sentences.chinese: 乡间的小路在村舍之间蜿蜒盘绕。

definition: School of Agriculture, school of thought of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
marketplace/town/the street (urban milieu)/the haunts of the common people
villager/(Tw) (Internet slang) person who likes to follow online discussions and add their opinions
